title: As a Jungler, what do you do if all lanes feed?
body: If the enemy team gets 4 kills before you have even run through your first clear and every single lane keeps on feeding because the ADC doesn't ward at all (at the very last minute she placed 2 useless wards because I repeatedly told her to use them), the support (Thresh) goes full tank immediately instead of buying support items like a sightstone, the mid laner doesn't ward either and the top laner doesn't ward the river, what do you do in such situations?
